methods.name: checkAccessibility
methods.rawDocumentation:
Check if the app has Accessibility permission
- Returns: true if permission is granted, false otherwise
methods.description: Check if the app has Accessibility permission

returns.description: true if permission is granted, false otherwise

methods.name: requestAccessibility
methods.rawDocumentation: Request Accessibility permission (shows system dialog if not granted)
methods.description: Request Accessibility permission (shows system dialog if not granted)

methods.name: checkScreenRecording
methods.rawDocumentation:
Check if the app has Screen Recording permission
- Returns: true if permission is granted, false otherwise
methods.description: Check if the app has Screen Recording permission

returns.description: true if permission is granted, false otherwise

methods.name: requestScreenRecording
methods.rawDocumentation:
Request Screen Recording permission
- Note: This will trigger a screen capture which prompts the system dialog

methods.name: checkCamera
methods.rawDocumentation:
Check if the app has Camera permission
- Returns: true if permission is granted, false otherwise
methods.description: Check if the app has Camera permission

returns.description: true if permission is granted, false otherwise

methods.name: requestCamera
methods.rawDocumentation:
Request Camera permission (shows system dialog if not granted)
- Parameter callback: Optional callback that receives true if granted, false if denied
methods.description: Request Camera permission (shows system dialog if not granted)

methods.name: checkMicrophone
methods.rawDocumentation:
Check if the app has Microphone permission
- Returns: true if permission is granted, false otherwise
methods.description: Check if the app has Microphone permission

returns.description: true if permission is granted, false otherwise

methods.name: requestMicrophone
methods.rawDocumentation:
Request Microphone permission (shows system dialog if not granted)
- Parameter callback: Optional callback that receives true if granted, false if denied
methods.description: Request Microphone permission (shows system dialog if not granted)
